document_notes.text:
This update for sqlite3 fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2022-46908: Properly implement the azProhibitedFunctions protection mechanism, 
  when relying on --safe for execution of an untrusted CLI script (bsc#1206337).
document_notes.title: Details

notes.text: SQLite through 3.40.0, when relying on --safe for execution of an untrusted CLI script, does not properly implement the azProhibitedFunctions protection mechanism, and instead allows UDF functions such as WRITEFILE.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description
